title: Please tell me there is a simple way to not use gestures I can't do it and I can't switch which hand
content: There has to be a way that I can put my gesture buttons in the order that I need them not what anybody else tells me and I don't know how to root and I don't know anything I just need the fucking buttons in the right spot please help
